questions.question: This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' involvement in a rebellion against a tyrant king on an island in the sky. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to transform into a large bird and control ice. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Hawk Eyes', is a master swordsman and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Who is...?
